title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dress in detail in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dress with details in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing details of a dress in a dream indicates the end of her worries and the dreamer does many good deeds, and God knows best. Also, this vision in a dream may indicate hearing good and happy news, as well as the happiness and goodness that the dreamer sees in his life. Also, seeing a dress with details in a dream may indicate a desire to commit a sin in the life of the dreamer and then repent from it, and everything will be done soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the details of a dress in a single woman’s dream: If the unmarried girl is frivolous, she sees in her dream that she is cutting a dress. She wears it for her engagement, as she is close to a good young man with whom she has an affair, and God knows best. This vision may also indicate the death of the unmarried girl’s worries and the good deeds that she will do, and it may also indicate joys and occasions. This vision in the dream also shows stability, calm, and a better life. And better, and a spacious home, and instability, and many trips abroad. Seeing the details of a white balloon dress in a dream may indicate her imminent marriage to a righteous man of high status and value, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman describing a dress in Her dream indicates the collapse of her worries and the end of all the family disputes that occur. Also, seeing a dress with details in the dream may indicate the marriage of one of her relatives or one of her children and may also indicate marital happiness. This vision may also indicate that she hears the news of an imminent pregnancy and is trying to achieve everything Her hopes and desires soon. Interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a dress with details, this indicates the birth of a baby girl and that she will be one of the good children. Also, this vision may indicate an easy and easy birth. It may also indicate that her affairs will ease, and it may also indicate Replacing God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the details of a dress in a dream for a man. If an unmarried man dreams in a dream of seeing a dress made for his wife, this means that his fears will be removed and he will enter a new job. Also, this vision can indicate a lot of food and abundant money for the pioneer, as well as his marriage A confidant of a good and beautiful girl, and God knows best. This vision can indicate great and good friends, and it can also indicate the love and happiness that the dreamer will experience in his life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you in As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Seeing grasshoppers in a dream. Interpretation of the vision. Locusts in a dream. Fly shows a lot of money that the fortuneteller gets. As for seeing grasshoppers flying from the ground and then flying into the sky, this is evidence of the problems that parents face. As for eating green locusts in a dream, it is a sign of nourishment and relief from distress. Seeing Locusts in a sick person’s dream are a sign of a short recovery. Seeing locusts in one’s dream Al-OsaimiIf an unmarried girl sees locusts in a dream, this indicates the bad luck she is enjoying. Also, locusts in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate the presence of envy in her life. In a way In general, locusts in a person’s dream are considered a sign of undesirable things, and it could be a marriage to a cheater, and this marriage ends in failure. Seeing locusts in a dream for a married woman. Seeing grasshoppers in a dream means money and livelihood for children. Locusts in a dream also indicate that a married woman cheats on bad etiquette. That A married woman seeing a wild grasshopper in a dream is a sign of money and good news about pregnancy. Seeing locusts in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is killing locusts, this indicates getting rid of problems and an easy birth. But if he sees a large group of locusts in a dream, this is an indication of the presence of Useless problems and events. Seeing locusts in a dream for an Al-Osaimi man. Seeing a man in a dream bitten by locusts is evidence of many bad events that the dreamer will witness. Seeing killing grasshoppers means getting rid of problems and fears. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment Below the article, we will respond to it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a green ribbon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a green ribbon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We present to you on the Moments website what is new and distinct in our article on our website, interpretation of dreams, interpretation of a dream, interpretation of a headband, interpretation of a headband in a dream, a green headband in a dream, interpretation of a green headband, interpretation of a green headband in A dream, a green headband in a dream by Ibn Sirin, seeing a turban in a dream, interpretation of a headband according to the material from which it is made, conditions for seeing a headband in a dream Learn more on the Moments website. Interpretation of a green headband in a dreamIn this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of a green headband in a dream , Interpretation of seeing a green headband, in a dream, Interpretation of a green headband in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, Interpretation of seeing a green headband in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s dream we talk about in detail in this paragraph. It indicates the crowns worn by influential Arabs, rulers of regions and cities, the minister, or the commander of the army. Every person has a high status in the country, and in some cases it is a sign of the man’s physical strength, wisdom, good morals, and high status, and that he enjoys a great position in The country. Conditions for seeing a headband in a dream. In this paragraph, we talk about the conditions for seeing a headband in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for seeing a headband in a dream. Interpretation of a green headband. Interpretation of a green headband in a dream. We talk about it in detail in this paragraph. Any person seen wearing a green scarf is a sign of power, prestige, and influence. And taking High positions at work. As for the one who dreams that he wraps the bandana or wraps it around his head in the dark. This is a sign that he will travel to a far place and people will be proud of him and proud of his glories and achievements in life. Whoever dreams that he is wearing a turban connected to another turban, or as if he is wearing two or more turbans. On his head, this is a sign of high status, high status, and progress in work. Whoever sees in a dream that his turban fell from his head, this is a sign of his loss in his work or his low standing among his people. However, if the turban is lifted from his head in a dangerous way, this is a sign of the loss of his current standing and his position among the people will not return to what it was before after his dismissal from his position. As for whoever sees him wearing a red bandana, it is a sign of promotion at work, and the number of turns around the head indicates The number of years that he will remain in his position and his new position. Interpretation of the headband according to the material from which it is made. In this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of the headband according to the material from which it is made, the interpretation of the green headband, the interpretation of the green headband in a dream, and the green headband in a dream by Ibn Sirin, seeing the turban in The dream, interpretation of the ring according to the material from which it is made by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing a ring, or holding it, or that it was given to him, and it was made of wool or cotton, then this is a sign of the righteousness of his religion, and the soundness of his religion. life. And his high status among the people, but if the headband is made by clowns, it is a sign of the high status of its owner or the one who wears it or carries it.¯ But at the same time, he does not have debts and collects illegal money, but if the turban is made of a material

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream by Ibn Shirin. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing reading Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream by Ibn Shireen and Al-Nabulsi. Read Surat Al-Mursalat. Read Surat Al-Mursalat to learn more on the Moments website. You can also watch: Surat An-Nisa in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of reading Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for Surat Al-Mursalat by Ibn Shirin. Sherine: Whoever dreams of reading it will expand his livelihood. And as Al-Nabulsi explained the dream of dreaming in Surat Al-Mursalat, he said: And whoever recites it or has it recited to him, as Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him, said, will envy his honorable family. It was said that he was given breadth and mercy, and it was said that he was safe from fear. Interpretation of Surat Al-Mursalat in The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees this Surah in a dream may indicate abundant sustenance and obtain a lot of money that the fortuneteller enjoys. This is according to what the experts have interpreted. It can confirm that the fortuneteller is on the straight path. Interpretation of Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream for an unmarried woman seeing Surah Al-Mursalat in a dream. A dream can indicate mercy, happiness, washing and washing for prayer. This indicates the good morals of the unmarried girl who sees this vision and may indicate the beauty and elegance that she enjoys and the approaching date of her wedding. If she sees a man reciting Surat Al-Mursalat over her, it may mean that she will marry this man soon And that he be a generous husband with high morals and walk on the straight path and see God in all his actions. This is what makes this vision suitable to reassure the viewer and get rid of the fear and anxiety that he suffers from. Also, seeing Surat Al-Mursalat can indicate the end of the problems and obstacles that he suffers from. The dreamer actually indicates the good and quiet life that the dreamer enjoys. See Surat Al-Mursalat for a married woman. When a married woman sees Surat Al-Murasalat in a dream, this may indicate the comfort she enjoys in her married life. Stability and free of problems and disagreements that affect the marital relationship. As It indicates the good morals of the wife and her care for her home, her family, and her husband. This vision is considered one of the good visions and good news for married women, as it provides the visionaries with the ability to live a life free of obstacles and problems. Surat Al-Mursalat also contains many verses that convey good meanings and good news to the dreamer. Interpretation of Surat Al-Mursalat In a dream for Nabulsi. The Nabulsi scholar explained seeing Surat Al-Mursalat in a dream that the opinion is jealous of its family and is distinguished by generosity and preserving children and children. It indicates the abundance of sustenance and mercy that he enjoys, and it may indicate the mercy of the owner of this vision to those around him. In general, seeing the Holy Qur’an, hearing it in a dream means kindness Happiness, abundance of sustenance, psychological comfort and stability. Complete in life, success and distinction in life on the ground. title: Interpretation of seeing wood in a dream and the meaning of seeing pieces of wood

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing wood in a dream by Ibn Sirin A dream about wood is one of those dreams that has multiple meanings and connotations that tell the dreamer many things in their different forms and circumstances. Interpretation of chopping wood in a dream for a single woman: This dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to slander and gossip by people who hold grudges and hatred. Announcement: Seeing a single girl cutting wood in a dream means that her efforts to achieve the goals that she was striving to achieve will be crowned with success and success, God willing. Then some scholars interpreted it as the dreamer’s victory over his enemies around him who want to harm him. Others interpreted cutting wood in a dream as breaking kinship ties that cannot be The dreamer wants to tie them, and cutting them is a symbol of that. It also indicates the fortuneteller’s desire to face obstacles in his career and his ability to overcome them. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about wood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a wooden sofa for a woman. A wooden sofa symbolizes in a dream the family that the woman lives with without The married woman, and the daily events that occur between her and her family. Seeing her sitting on the wooden sofa and showing signs of joy and happiness. It indicates a high status and status among peers and a bright future, God willing. Only seeing her in a dream reclining on the sofa indicates psychological stability, due to the stability of the situation in which You live in it in real life. Interpretation of wooden boards in a dream. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of seeing wooden boards that the dreamer occupies a high position in his society with his understanding of religion, wisdom and wisdom. I see him kissing wooden boards. It appears from a religious scholar that he has acquired more religious knowledge that people benefit from. Who is about to Marriage when he sees a dream about wooden boards indicates the date of his imminent marriage to a woman distinguished by piety and justice. She will give birth to good offspring, God willing. It is interpreted for an unmarried woman if she sees that she is holding wooden boards, heralds good relations, and the arrival of goodness and blessings in the next season of her life. Seeing men carrying Plates indicate that her marriage will be delayed, and that he will have unpleasant things for her. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about wood in a dream about a man and a woman. Interpretation of seeing wooden boards in a dream for a married woman. It is considered one of the good visions for a married woman, foretelling the coming of good deeds and the stability of her family situation. If See Married Whitewood tells her in a dream that she heard good news that satisfies her heart, such as the success or success of her children in their studies, or her husband’s appointment to one of the most prestigious jobs. Seeing red wood is interpreted as a prediction of family problems that will disrupt one’s life and make it unstable. Wood Black: Interpretation of seeing it in a dream means that you will receive bad news and lose a family member. A married woman sees firewood burning, and this indicates the loss of money. Some scholars have interpreted this as an expectation of separation from her husband due to problems between them. See also: - Interpretation of seeing a wooden comb and its meaning In a dream, interpretation of a dream about wood carving in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing dawn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see dawn in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, to see dawn in a dream is a sign of ending tension and sadness and freedom from problems, because it shows wealth after poverty, freedom from sadness, repentance, and return to God. It is one of the noble visions that show the happiness and beauty of the dreamer, and the dawn prayer in the mosque has a lot of goodness and blessing for those who perform it, and therefore we convey to you the most important interpretation of your dream. Seeing dawn in a dream. Follow us. A dream about seeing dawn by Ibn Sirini. The interpretation of dawn in a dream proves that a person has been liberated from problems and troubles in life. The interpretation of dawn in a dream for an already married man is different from his wife, which indicates their separation. Seeing dawn in a businessman’s dream proves that It will bring him generous profits and gains. Seeing the dawn prayer in his sleep is testimony to his achieving his goals and ambitions. A dream of seeing the dawn for a married woman: Seeing the dawn in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she is living a stable life and a feeling of comfort. The interpretation of the dawn that a married woman sees in a dream can say that she will be Blessed and gentle in her life. The dawn of a married woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her pregnancy. The dawn of a married woman’s dream indicates that she is living a happy married life. She dreams of seeing the dawn for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the dream of dawn in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the upcoming date of birth. In addition, seeing the dawn Dawn in a pregnant woman's dream also proves that she has a child, which will make her life happier. Dream of seeing dawn for a manSeeing dawn in a dream of a prisoner who dreams of dawn suggests a kind of comfort, pain and consolation. Explain that seeing dawn in a man's dream and praying for dawn in unfinished cases , means that half of his debt will be paid soon. The man saw in a dream the dawn and the Holy Cup, which indicates the disappearance of his sadness and anxiety. The dream of seeing the dawn prayer. The interpretation of the dream of seeing the dawn in a dream is a sign of the beginning of a new life. Seeing the dawn and the end of the prayer relieves him of anxiety and sadness. The prayer showed The immoral person in the church provides rich living and wealth in his life. A young man’s dawn prayer proves that he will marry a good girl. Seeing dawn and falling in a married woman’s dream indicates her readiness to satisfy her desires in life. A pregnant woman’s dream of seeing dawn is evidence of the ease of her birth. Seeing dawn in a dream is evidence of The Prophet’s journey on the path of guidance and justice. Surat Al-Fajr is evidence of a person’s distress in his dream, and God helps him. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Quraysh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Quraysh in a dream. We have published in previous articles many interpretations of dreams that many of you are searching for and looking for a suitable interpretation but cannot find. We will continue to follow them today in the issue of the dream interpretations series. Today we will learn about the interpretation of dreaming about Surat Quraysh in a dream in detail with all its connotations and interpretations. We will learn about the interpretations. Based on what was stated in the books of the scholar Ibn Sirin and the scholar Ibn Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surah Quraish in Manamourah Quraish. Whoever recites it, may God protect him from fear, or desire good deeds, or people will love him, or do good for everyone, or be blessed with happiness without fatigue, or have a lot of profit in travel. Whoever recites Surat Quraish will provide sustenance for the needy, and God alone and the loving hearts of His servants. Whoever recites it in a dream or something from it, or if it is recited to him, this is evidence of the obligation of Hajj, if he is one of the people of guidance and honesty, otherwise he will eat of the food of God Almighty without it. Thank you.Interpretation of a dream about Surat Quraysh in the MillenniumThe pink millennium has come: Quraysh is food without fatigue or effort, and I have seen it every time it is committed. Whoever reads in a dream Surat Quraysh or something like that, Hajj is permitted for him if he is among the people of guidance and trust. It was said that eating food God is without thanks. It is said that He brings people together and brings them together. Only God knows.Interpretation of a dream about Surat Quraysh according to Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about Surat Quraysh according to Al-Nabulsi: Whoever reads it or has recited it, this indicates the obligation of Hajj if he is among the people of guidance and trust.Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Quraysh in a dream by Ibn Sirino, and whoever reads it in a dream or something from it, or if He recites it to him, as this is evidence of the obligation of Hajj, if he is one of the people of guidance and trust. Otherwise, he eats the diet of Almighty God without gratitude. It was said: He provides success to people and feeds the needy, and it is said: He eats food without getting tired, and it is said: He gains a lot on the journey he wants. Today, through the “Moments” website, we presented to you the interpretation of a dream about Surat Quraysh in a dream. In If you have questions or dreams that you are looking for an explanation for, share your comments with us and our experts will answer them as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing vinegar in a dream and what it shows

preview.html: Seeing vinegar in a dream, vinegar contains high nutrients and many minerals. It contains sodium, iron and many vitamins. Important for lowering blood sugar and cholesterol, cleansing the intestines, burns, and promoting health. In a dream, vinegar indicates the blessing of food and money. Drinking vinegar in a dream with bread symbolizes the dreamer’s acquisition of blessed money. It denotes the observer's commitment to worship, safety, death of fear, escape from conspiracy, and healing. One of the diseases that indicates a happy marriage for a girl. To satisfy desires, and if the taste is bad or very sour, then it is not good and indicates worry and distress. Seeing black vinegar in a woman’s dream. Black vinegar in a dream is a good dream that indicates many good things for the dreamer. Black vinegar in an unmarried girl’s dream shows her many Of the benefits and a lot of goodness in her life, as it indicates that she will obtain a higher academic qualification such as a doctorate. A girl’s vision of black vinegar indicates her marriage to a man who has a high social status. Red vinegar in a woman’s dream. Seeing vinegar in a dream can indicate money from a woman and drinking. Red vinegar means happiness and contentment. It is not recommended to see vinegar in a dream that is very acidic, or the dreamer hates its taste, and this indicates crises in this case. Interpretation of the gift of vinegar in a dream Seeing vinegar in a dream Giving vinegar in a dream means that the dreamer will come well and that he will hear good news And it also indicates that he will get money. It also indicates safety and comfort after fatigue and fear. Interpretation of a bottle of vinegar in a dream: Seeing a bottle of vinegar in a dream indicates the blessing of food, money, and the satisfaction of desires. Seeing vinegar eating bread in a dream indicates the blessing of money, livelihood, and the blessing of health and children. It also indicates the observer’s commitment to worship, integrity, piety, and contentment with little. Seeing vinegar in a dream is also associated with safety, removing fear, and escaping conspiracies, as indicated by loyal friends. Seeing white vinegar in a man’s dream, and white vinegar in a man’s dream indicates a lot of money that he will obtain in the coming days. And for halal trade or payment from reliable sources. Vinegar in the eyes of a young man indicates his marriage to a good girl. Interpretation of offering vinegar in a dream. Seeing vinegar in a dream. White vinegar indicates halal food and freedom from life’s problems and worries. Eating or drinking vinegar in a dream also indicates That the dreamer will suffer from a serious illness and that his eyesight is not good. Buying vinegar in a dream indicates that vinegar is a successful and fruitful deal for the man or young man. It also indicates the ability to live. Pure white vinegar indicates an improvement in the physical and psychological condition. Seeing vinegar being served in a dream represents Good luck and future pioneers. Interpretation of a dream about putting vinegar in the hair of an unmarried woman. Seeing vinegar in a dream: Vinegar is one of the good dreams for a girl and indicates the arrival of goodness and abundance for her. Vinegar in the hair also indicates the fulfillment of distant desires and dreams. Sprinkling vinegar in a dream for a single woman. Vinegar in a dream for a single girl

title: Interpretation of seeing a dollar in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing the dollar in a dream by Ibn Sirin. This is one of the most common dreams among people and there are many interpretations of it by Ibn Sirin and other scholars, but these interpretations differ depending on the vision and appearance. And the internal influences of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dollar in a dream. Seeing a dollar in a dream, this fully indicates the dreamer’s abundant luck and the blessing of success in various areas of his real life. This shows that a dollar in a dream is a symbol of happiness, in which money has the largest share. It informs the dreamer of the good news that he may receive. Which will have a positive impact on his psyche in the coming period, God willing. Seeing a fake dollar in a dream is the viewer being surrounded by people who treat him treacherously, hate him, and hate him. If one sees that he is carrying paper dollars, this indicates the improvement of the financial conditions that the viewer enjoys and what he also values ​​in wisdom and good management. Affairs. A married man promises that he will have a beautiful and beautiful child. The boxes are full of dollars. The major announces that he is receiving a lot of money thanks to his inheritance from a relative of his. It indicates that in the dreamer’s life there are many desires that are not fulfilled, so he must strive and persevere to achieve these desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing A dollar in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a new dollar in a dream tells her about the success she will achieve in finding a new job and improving her financial situation. This portends great success in the experiences she will obtain, whether in the field of study or in reaching a prestigious position. Seeing a dollar in a dream for a single woman indicates Married indicates the possibility of her traveling abroad to work and earning money because of that. And I have a vision of a free girl, for many dollars and in large quantities, this is interpreted as the dreamer’s longevity, but if she sees that she is stealing dollars, this indicates problems and judgments that she will receive in the next period of her life. Giving her dollars that she had dreamed of in a dream to an unknown person shows what affects her in real life because of her urgent need for security and containment. Only seeing in the dream in which she found dollars indicates that she has a distinctive personality that loves self-confidence and strength that helps her cope with life. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about paper money in a dream about Al-Asimi. Interpretation of seeing a dollar in a dream for a married woman. I mean, seeing a dollar in a married woman’s dream is that she has a strong personality capable of dealing with crises and the smooth development of things in her real life. Given the possibility of traveling outside the country, she is always looking forward to working in one of the jobs. Excellent, which will improve her financial situation for her and her family in the near future, God willing. And if she sees in a dream that she is receiving dollars from someone close to her, this indicates that she will accumulate material benefits and an abundance of kindness and livelihood. It was also mentioned that this is good news for a wedding attendee who has not given birth will become pregnant by her husband. It has good offspring, God willing. Individual categories. See a married woman, she is carrying a box with a large amount of dollars, and this indicates the extent of her relationship

title: Interpretation of menstruation in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of menstruation in a dream is one of two interpretations, sometimes it is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems, and in other cases it is a sign of stress and excessive tension of the dreamer. Because a woman experiences her period on a monthly basis, predicts when it will come, and tracks her symptoms, it assumes little of her own thinking. But what if this dream was for a man, and what are the signs of menstruation in a dream in different cases when the fortuneteller is in the dream, we will learn that through the following article in the encyclopedia.Interpretation of menstruation in a dreamInterpretation of menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing menstruation in a dream It is a sign of happiness and getting rid of the worries and sorrow that the dreamer suffered from in reality. It is also a sign of the end of the feeling of anxiety and tension, and the beginning of safety and comfort that the dreamer will enjoy. In some cases, seeing menstruation or menstruation in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s ability to achieve all What I dreamed about in reality. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream may be about the material gains and profits that the dreamer will achieve in the dream. But seeing menstruation in a dream does not bode well for the man at all. On the contrary, seeing menstrual blood in a man’s dream is a sign of the state of stress and tension in which he lives, and at other times, seeing menstrual blood in a man’s dream is a sign of sorrows and worries that will occur. It rises upon him, God forbid. Black blood in a woman’s or man’s dream is considered a disturbing dream, as it indicates difficulties and problems that the dreamer will face in reality. For a man who sees menstruation in his dream, seeing it could be a sign of sins and disobedience that he commits in his life. This dream is a warning to him about the need to repent and return to God Almighty. If you see menstrual blood being washed and purified, it is considered a sign of repentance. The presence of menstrual blood on the clothes in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s sins and perhaps mistakes that he regrets at the present time. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a girlMenstruation in an unmarried girl’s dream is usually a reflection of the state of stress and tension that She is experiencing it because of the approaching time of her menstrual cycle, or perhaps the menstrual cycle is delayed and irregular. If she does not think about it at all in reality, then her dream is a sign that she will get rid of worries and problems, and perhaps her marriage will be soon. Al-Nabulsi does not agree with Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of the vision. Menstruation in a dream for an unmarried woman, as he sees it as a sign of the sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer that he must repent of immediately. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for a married, non-pregnant woman: This vision in a married woman’s dream has two aspects, sometimes it is a sign of kindness and abundance, whether with money, Or in procreation, in the case of the blood being red and pink, without pain or difficulty. But if the blood is black in color or accompanied by pain in the dream, this is an indication of the many difficulties and problems that the woman will face in her life and that she will not be able to solve, and this vision can
